description:
We have created a limited-edition capsule of mementos designed to transport you to some of our favourite places in Ibiza.

    Lightweight cotton destination logo t-shirt
    Destination logo "Ibiza"
    Yellow with contrast blue logo
    Slight box shape fit
    Crew neckline with rib collar
    Two sizes - M and XL
    100% Cotton
    Cold machine wash on a delicate cycle

Puglia, south-east Italy. A series of hillside towns whitewashed by sun and sand. Engulfed by vast plains and a sapphire sea. Expansive and energetic. Unashamedly unkempt. A land of beautiful extremes.We have created a limited-edition capsule of mementos designed to transport you to some of our favourite places in Puglia: Pescoluse, Margherita Di Savoia and Polignano a Mare.Lightweight cotton destination logo t-shirtDestination logo "Pescoluse"Bright green with contrast chocolate logoSlight box shape fitCrew neckline with rib collarTwo sizes - M and XL100% CottonCold machine wash on a delicate cycle
